inclusion.criterion: tumor not located in brainstem, midbrain, or ventricular system
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: planning to undergo standard radiation therapy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: performance status KPS > or equal to 70
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: serum creatinine < 2mg/dl and calculated creatinine clearance >10ml/min
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: ability to tolerate MRI scan procedure
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: evidence of metastatic disease or other malignancy
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: prior radiation therapy to the brain or prior treatment for brain tumor
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: other serious co-morbid illness or compromised organ function
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: patient has a history of anaplastic astrocytoma and is planning to undergo standard radiation therapy
